channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dems lose ground to GOP contenders in pivotal Senate races as voters lock in: poll
item.description: Races are tightening in key Senate battlegrounds as the election nears, with several incumbent Democrats at risk of being unseated.
